name: Shinobi Ambush
description:
Target near Stealth Forest or one of your buildings to summon a group Shinobi with Torinoko Grenades that increase damage taken by 50% and slow enemies by 30% for 3 seconds.
The Shinobi will escape after 90 seconds or if they used their 3 grenades.
descriptionCN:
瞄准浓密森林附近或其中一座己方建筑，使用鸟之子烟雾弹召唤一群忍者，让敌方承受的伤害 +50%，并让敌方的速度 -30%，持续 3 秒。
忍者在 90 秒后或用完 3 枚烟雾弹后就会逃走。
displayClassesCN: 单击鼠标左键，然后在目标位置上单击鼠标左键
